title: Is this still the place for Boards Bug reports? (and bug report)
body:
Or is that the Report a Bug section?

Assuming it is, this:

http://i.imgur.com/bxL2BJT.png

False out of one rioter [comments](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/BQ567I66-new-gd-needs-ok-thread?comment=000d). I expect it's because Frost is a new red.

replies.body: Yes, feel free to continue to report issues on the Boards in Boards Feedback.

Thank for the response :)

As an aside, are you new to the Boards team, or have you just been working behind the curtain?
D'oh! How did I miss this? :O
